attributes.action: make allowances for larger families who by law need to drive a larger car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am a mum to four young children all of which require a car seat, i CAN NOT get all of my family in a regular saloon car so i need to drive a 7 seater, the goverment are now penalising people like myself who need the larger car. I got a estimate of my new road tax for when the hike comes into force and it will be approximately 455pounds per year,
this is a stupid ammount, and as usual the families of england suffer. labour are correct me if im wrong the peoples government and im not seeing this.
if you agree please sign the petition

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
